nodes.text: The Starblue Ranger was a ILH-KK Citadel-class civilian cruiser owned by the Wookiee hunter known as Captain Shorwarr. The Wookiee, who made a living hunting predatory nexu on the planet Cholganna, used the starship during the Galactic Civil War between the Galactic Empire and the Alliance to Restore the Republic. The ship, from a line of armored transports manufactured by Koensayr Manufacturing, was customized to included cages and storage compartments in the hull.

The Starblue Ranger first appeared in 2013 in Beyond the Rim, an adventure module written by Sterling Hershey for the Fantasy Flight Games roleplaying game, Star Wars: Edge of the Empire. It was not involved in the books main campaign storyline but included in a suggestion for a potential extension of the story at the end of the book.
